## Task 1
```{r}
library(mosaic)
galtonData <- mosaicData::Galton
nbins <- 10
```

## Task 2
```{r}
evenly_spaced <- seq(min(galtonData$height), max(galtonData$height), length.out = nbins + 1)
evenly_spaced
```

## Task 3
```{r}
bin_counts <- table(cut(galtonData$height, evenly_spaced))
```
